choices: Try to make Weiss her girlfriend
Gos to get help, she doesn't know what's happening
Asks Weiss some questions
Freaks out
other
1.content:
Ruby Rose was told that her silver eyes were special. She thought she would learn more about that in Beacon. She didn't. Ruby only learned one thing in this school.

She likes girls.

She really, really like Weiss especially. Ruby was told that her eyes were special but as far as she was concerned they didn't hold a candle to Weiss's piercing blue.

Unfortunately, it didn't seem like Weiss likes girls. If only Ruby could change that...

"...by! Ruby! Are you listening dolt?" Weiss asked angrily snapping Ruby out of her trance.

"Huh? Oh, sorry Weiss!" Ruby apologized "I'm trying to focus, honest."

"Well your failing." Weiss sighed "I don't see why you can't focus on the simplest of subjects."

"...I said I'm sorry." Ruby pouted.

"You can't get out of this by being cute!" Weiss berated her.

"You think I'm cute?"

"Stop trying to change the subject! I'm not helping you for my health." Weiss leaned closer to Ruby "If you don't try then you're just wasting my ti-"

Ruby kissed her. She couldn't help herself, Weiss was right there! Of course Weiss pulled back immediately.

"Wha-Ruby!"

"I'm sorry! You were so close and I was watching you all day or well all week and you're pretty and you're nice to me well not always nice but you're so cool so I thought-"

"Ruby. Shut up." Weiss interrupted her.

Ruby did as she was told and sat there anxiously.

"Ruby. I'm...flattered but I don't...like girls like that." Weiss said trying to sound diplomatic "Not even you."

Ruby stayed silent. She didn't like this...

"Ruby? Are you ignoring me now?"

Ruby pursed her lips.

"Ruby I'm sorry. Just...say something."

Ruby closed her eyes.

"Damn it dolt! I cannot carry this conversation by myself."

Ruby's eyes shot open now glowing with silver light.

"R-Ruby!?"

"NO!" Ruby shouted.

The light shot out of Ruby's eyes into Weiss's. Ruby was surprised.

"W-Weiss?" Ruby asked

"...yes..." Weiss droned, her eyes glowing dim silver light.

Ruby swallowed. Was this her eyes? Ruby...
1.title: Ruby's Progress

Ruby makes Weiss wear her clothes
Ruby orders Weiss to get Yang so she can do this to her.

13.content:
"Weiss can you hear me?"asked Ruby confused still.

"Yes.."

"Do you know what happened?"asked Ruby.

"I think it was your eyes Ruby,"answered Weiss."They are so Hypnotic."

"Really you think it was?"asked Ruby."I can make you do anything I want I guess then?"

"Yes.."

"Hm..really?'asked Ruby thinking of what to make Weiss do.
13.title: Asks Weiss some questions

choices: Ruby comes back and Weiss asks her out
Ruby goes and asks Yang for help
other
134.content:
"Miss Rose, while I am thrilled to see you finally use your silver eyes I wouldn't suggest the library. Too many potential witnessess."

"Ahh!" Ruby jumped up to see Ozpin standing there. "I-I didn't...how long were you here?"

"I walk in right around the time Miss Schnee rejected you." Ozpin said "Terribly sorry."

"Um...it- It's fine." Ruby said

"Now now Miss Rose, your eyes activated. That's proof that it's not fine with you." Ozpin said "I was hoping that your eyes would activate the power to destroy grimm first. Oh well, at least you can practice their use like this."

"Wait, my eyes can...destroy grimm?" Ruby asked

"Well, it's more like they preserve life." Ozpin said "They can also direct the light of others, like they are now. You only have so long to do something about Miss Schnee's deposition, I suggest that you get on with it."

"B-but would it still count?" Ruby asked "Would it count as her really liking me?"

Ozpin turned around "I think it's a question of if you're happy with Weiss not recepricating your feelings, rather than if it 'counts' or not."

Ozpin walked away and Ruby looked over her Bff. Weiss's eyes were slowly losing the silver glow that Ruby bestowed upon them.

"Weiss from now on," Ruby swallowed "You are attracted to boys and girls. You won't remember that I kissed you, but you will know that as far as girls go, I am exactly your type. The closer to me a girl is the prettier they are."

The last bit of silver glow drained from Weiss's eye as Ruby said that and Weiss woke up.

"Ruby? Do you need to get something?" Weiss asked looking at Ruby standing there.

"Er...Bathroom." Ruby said as she walked off. Ruby had no idea if that worked, but she preyed that it did.

Meanwhile Weiss was wondering if Ruby should be the first girl she dated. Ruby was exactly her type for girls, but she never really explored that side of her sexuality that much. She mostly prefers men, but Ruby is cute and it's not like she isn't attracted to women.

choices: ruby figures out how to use the power again
Ruby can't figure out how to use the power again

Something else
1342.content:
Ruby runs in the halls back to there dorm room. Hoping Yang was inside. She found Yang who looked to be getting undressed into her normal clothes and not the uniform.

"Ruby can you knock next time ?"asked Yang.

"Uh..sorry ,"mumbled Ruby." Maybe you should lock the door next time?"

"Yeah I forgot to,"said Yang."Anyway it seems you were in rush..something on your mind?"

"Well..I uh..sorta,"mumbled Ruby mumbling not knowing how to explain to her sister.

"Split it out Ruby,"said Yang.

"I got these new powers with my eyes,"said Ruby.

"New powers with your eyes?"asked Yang."What do you mean by that?"

"It will be hard to show you,"answered Ruby.

"How so?"asked Yang."You can just use the power on me. Unless it's something dangerous."

"That is the thing I don't know how to do it again,"said Ruby mumbling.

"Hm..how about you try on me and see if it works. You can always undo whatever you do right?"asked Yang.

"Yeah I can,"said Ruby nodding.
1342.title: Ruby goes and asks Yang for help

choices: Install some humiliating programs and triggers into Yang
Reprogram Yang to serve her in various ways
Something else
13421.content:
Ruby tried her hardest to use her new power. She wasn't sure how exactly she did it the first time...

But Ruby's childishness helped her, as it usually does. She saw this as some kind of super power. And she wasn't exactly WRONG. So using her morning cartoon thought concept, she assumed all she needed to do was just... have the desire to use her power.

Suddenly, something clicked. She felt the power activate.

"Woah. Rubes your eyes. They look... s...so...." Yang began, before trailing off, standing there slack, her mouth open a little, eyes wide.

"It worked! Yes!" she said, pumping her fist in triumph.

"Yang! You too!" she added..

"It worked! Yes!" Yang replied, happily hopping into the air, swinging her fist in the same manner Ruby did.

Honestly, as much as she wanted to go back and get Weiss to be a bit more... open with her, Ruby was at a bit of an impasse.

She had her older sister, her hot older sister, here under her control. She honestly wanted this. A lot. Not necessarily for sexual reasons... well, not JUST for sexual reasons, but also for a bit of payback.

Ruby had always fantasized about having Yang be completely beholden to her. Various fantasies of humiliating her for all the "big sister" pranks, taunts, and messes over the years. Fantasies about turning her into a servant, filling various roles to counter the years of big sister "favors" she would "request". There were so many options!

Ruby looked her mesmerized older sister up and down, trying to decide what to do, before choosing to...
13421.title: ruby figures out how to use the power again

info.description:
(During first three volumes.)

Ruby Rose has been told that her eyes are special, but it was never explained what was special about them. That is until she stared into her Bffs eyes. Ruby had always wanted to fuck Weiss and now she was the perfect chance.
